description: This page describes how to collect (NGN) payments via USSD.

spec.account_bank: Required - true : This is the Bank numeric code e.g 058
spec.tx_ref: Required - true: Required - false: This is a unique reference, unique to the particular transaction being carried out.  It is generated when it is not provided by the merchant for every transaction.
spec.amount: Required - true: This is the amount to be charged it is passed as - (“amount”:`100`). N.B. Amount should not be less than 100.
spec.currency: Required: true : This is the specified currency to charge in. (Expected value: NGN)
spec.fullname: Required - false: Should include first and last name of the customer
spec.email: Required - true: This is the email address of the customer.
spec.phone_number: Required - false: This is the phone number linked to the customer's mobile money account.
spec.client_ip: Required - false: IP - Internet Protocol. This represents the current IP address of the customer carrying out the transaction.
spec.device_fingerprint: Required - false: This is the fingerprint for the device being used. It can be generated using a library on whatever platform is being used.
spec.meta: Required - false: This is to include additional payment information
